Posts.Title: Immediate or delayed recon?

Posts.Content: hi loise dont be afraid am  still on chemo treatment. the most important thing is to keep your optimism. its just mind over matter to over come those side effects. During those times that you feel weak just think of the good things and keep smiling.    During my first chemo i feel nauseated but there is medicine for evrything just drink more fluid and eat a balanced diet

Posts.Content: hi berny4   If you really love her just hang in there. You know to have the big C is not that simple thing. She is just confused and withdrawn. Maybe she's angry with the world that she's throwing it all on you. Just remember all the good times you've been together. And remember being in the relationship is not only for good times but also for bad times.Have more patience  give her some space . But stay with her she needed you!!! Its the time that she need somebody to cheer her up!!!! Be strong be man enough for her.    Thnx Loren
